Package jpacman.model

Class EngineTest

java.lang.Object
jpacman.model.GameTestCase
jpacman.model.EngineTest
public class EngineTest extends GameTestCase
Systematic testing of the game state transitions. The test makes use of the simple map and its containing monsters and players, as defined in the GameTestCase.

Version:
$Id: EngineTest.java,v 1.6 2008/02/04 23:00:12 arie Exp $
Author:
Arie van Deursen; Aug 5, 2003
